ui <- fluidPage(

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  output$map <- renderLeaflet({
    leaflet(data=bigfoot) %>% addTiles()%>%
      addMarkers(lng = ~longitude, lat = ~latitude, popup = ~as.character(bigfoot$date), label = ~as.character(bigfoot$date))%>%
      setView(lng = -121.771598, lat = 38.533867, zoom = 5.5) %>% #current center set to be Davis
      addProviderTiles('Esri.WorldImagery') #you can add urls and other things
      #addTiles()
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
